headline.main: Muslim Separatist Militants in Thailand Kill 6 Civilians

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The violence, which occurred in six separate episodes over 24 hours, may have been retribution for the arrest of militants, a police official said....
lead_paragraph: The violence, which occurred in six separate episodes over 24 hours, may have been retribution for the arrest of militants, a police official said.
